amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the modernization of the nuclear command, control, and communications architecture of the United States.

vote.text: Amendment SA 404 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 404 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Fischer. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text: CR 3/26/2015 S2017) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to the modernization of the nuclear command, control, and communications architecture of the United States.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 404 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 404 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Fischer.
